name: AddFolderlessListToSpace
description:
Add a new folderless list to a specified space.

This tool is used to create a new list within a specified space in ClickUp without associating it with a folder. It facilitates the organization of tasks directly within the space.

parameters.name: space_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the space where the list will be added.

parameters.name: list_name
parameters.description: The name of the new list to be created within the space.

parameters.name: list_description
parameters.description: A text description for the new list. Use plain text. For markdown, use `markdown_content`.

parameters.name: list_markdown_description
parameters.description: Markdown formatted description for the list. Use this instead of a plain text description.

value_schema.description: Use `markdown_content` instead of `content` to format your List description.

parameters.name: due_date_timestamp
parameters.description: An integer representing the UNIX timestamp for the list's due date. This defines the deadline for the list.

parameters.name: list_priority_level
parameters.description: Set the priority level for the list. It should be an integer value indicating the list's urgency or importance.

parameters.name: list_owner_user_id
parameters.description: The user ID for the list owner to be assigned to the new list.

value_schema.description: Include a `user_id` to add a List owner.

parameters.name: list_color_status
parameters.description: Specifies the color representing the List. This is for visual identification and does not affect task statuses.

value_schema.description: **Status** refers to the List color rather than the task Statuses available in the List.

parameters.name: include_due_time
parameters.description: Set to true if the due date should include a specific time.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the clickup API.

parameters.name: markdown_content
parameters.description: Use `markdown_content` instead of `content` to format your List description.

value_schema.description: Use `markdown_content` instead of `content` to format your List description.

parameters.name: assignee
parameters.description: Include a `user_id` to add a List owner.

value_schema.description: Include a `user_id` to add a List owner.

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: **Status** refers to the List color rather than the task Statuses available in the List.

value_schema.description: **Status** refers to the List color rather than the task Statuses available in the List.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
